  • marmot.plottingmodules.plotutils.plot_library.create_stackplot
  • View page source

marmot.plottingmodules.plotutils.plot_library.create_stackplot

create_stackplot(axs, data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, color_dict: dict, labels: Optional[list] = None, n: int = 0, **kwargs)[source]

Creates a stacked area plot

Wrapper around matplotlib.stackplot.

Parameters

  • axs (matplotlib.axes) – matplotlib.axes

  • data (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame of data to plot.

  • color_dict (dict) – Colour dictionary, keys should be in data columns.

  • label (list, optional) – List of labels for legend. Defaults to None.

  • n (int, optional) – Counter for facet plot. Defaults to 0.
